name: Smogus
description:
Fly Pig Games Entry for the Epic Game Jam 2022.

Smogus is a Rogue Lite delivery sim. You are a chosen pilot tasked with delivering air and water to the last two remaining cities on Earth. The moment you take off, you are unable to land, and the only way to stay in the air is by completing deliveries to obtain fuel. Upgrade your ship and complete as many deliveries as possible.
